sentences: Informal consultations on Articles 5, 7 and 8 were held in Bonn, from 6-8 October.
As a result of these consultations, as well as the inputs by Parties during SB-13 Part I, a new text has been developed by the Co-Chairs of the relevant SBSTA contact group.
This text (FCCC/SBSTA/2000/13) will function as a parallel text to the negotiating text tabled during SB-13 Part I.
enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
